text: (unake maabood) arz karengen- subahaan allaah (ham to khud tere bande the) hamen ye kisee tarah zeba na tha ki ham tujhe chhodakar doosare ko apana saraparast banaate (phir apane ko kyon kar maabood banaate) magar baat to ye hai ki too hee ne inako baap daadaon ko chain diya-yahaan tak ki in logon ne (teree) yaad bhula dee aur ye khud halaak hone vaale log the
